collection_result.text_hint: The collected ingredients are listed here

recipe_row.add_note_disabled_tooltip: Enter a URL to add a note
recipe_row.modify_recipe_disabled_tooltip: Enter a URL to modify the recipe

missing_cors_plugin.title: CORS plugin is missing
missing_cors_plugin.message:
The data from {recipeUrl} couldn't be fetched. You may need a CORS plugin to use this website.
- For Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/allow-cors-access-control/lhobafahddgcelffkeicbaginigeejlf 
- For Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/access-control-allow-origin 
- For Edge: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/allow-cors-accesscontro/bhjepjpgngghppolkjdhckmnfphffdag

http_request_error.title: HTTP request failed
http_request_error.message: An error occurred while fetching {recipeUrl}. The server returned status code {status} and message '{message}'.

deliberately_unsupported_url.title: Url is not supported
deliberately_unsupported_url.message: Parsing {recipeUrl} is deliberately not supported. This may be because the html structure is different from most other recipes, or because there is no recipe on that site.

amount_failure.title: Failed to parse the amount of an ingredient
amount_failure.message:
An error occurred while parsing {recipeUrl}.
The amount '{amountString}' of the ingredient '{ingredientName}' couldn't be parsed to a number.

ingredient_failure.title: Failed to parse an ingredient
ingredient_failure.message: An error occurred while parsing {recipeUrl}. An ingredient couldn't be parsed.

recipe_note_dialog.title: Add recipe note
recipe_note_dialog.text_area_helper: This note will be saved and displayed when the ingredients for this recipe are collected in the future.
recipe_note_dialog.text_area_hint: e.g. "4 servings is not enough for two people, use 8 instead!"
